oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: You Keep Coming Back To Me - Brenda Lee performance - 1963-10-25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of You Keep Coming Back To Me, written by Wayne Moss and Jan Crutchfield, produced by Owen Bradley, recorded on October 25, 1963 at Columbia Recording Studio in Nashville, Tenn., and performed by Brenda Lee (vocals), Grady Martin (guitar), Harold Bradley (guitar), Ray Edenton (guitar), Bob Moore (bass), Buddy Harman (drums), Floyd Cramer (piano), and the Anita Kerr Singers (background vocals).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Brenda Lee
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Brenda Lee performs "You Keep Coming Back To Me"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: [Forrest Hills letterhead] Two copies of "You Keep Coming Back To Me" lyric sheets [typed], "You Keep Coming Back To Me" sheet music [typed], and a Forrest Hills Music envelope addressed to Eddy Arnold [typed] stored with transcription documents, Box 4
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Moss, Wayne; Bradley, Owen; Lee, Brenda, 1944-; Martin, Grady, 1929-; Bradley, Harold (Guitarist); Edenton, Ray; Moore, Bob, 1932-; Harman, Buddy; Cramer, Floyd, 1933-1997; Anita Kerr Singers
